lines.text: Dad improved the place a lot, but it's still the same old Circle B, isn't it, Joe?

[after some gentle laughter]
I knew you'd still love it, Alice. I guess people just don't forget the good things they had when they were kids.

[after a pause]
But the best of these good things are gone. My father... and yours.
Hey, wait a minute - haven't I seen you begore somewheres?

lines.character: Marshal Buck Roberts, alias Bob 'Bodie' Bronson

lines.text: You don't happen to chew gum, do yuh?
Gum? When I start chewin' gum, I'll stop packin' my gums.
lines.character: Marshal Buck Roberts, alias Bob 'Bodie' Bronson

lines.text: Watch for THE ROUGH RIDERS when they ride again.
